_source.short_desc: Simplified endpoint management for desktops, servers, and mobile laptops.
_source.long_desc: GoTo Central is a powerful, easy-to-use endpoint management solution enabling IT professionals to effectively monitor, manage, and secure their endpoint infrastructure. Whether you have remote employees or endpoints scattered across the globe, GoTo Central provides IT organizations with the speed, flexibility, and insight needed to increase productivity, reduce IT costs, and mitigate risk.
_source.target_audience: Small Business, Mid Size Business, and Large Enterprises in Internal IT, MSPs, and Tech Support organizations.

category_features.name: Backup and Recovery
category_features.definition: Create backups and provide methods to recover deleted/lost data

category_features.name: Billing & Invoicing
category_features.definition: Create and manage monetary interactions between parties (ie. bills and invoices)

category_features.name: CRM
category_features.definition: Contact and lead management to track interactions and notes about clients and prospects

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: An assembly of graphs and charts for tracking statistics and metrics

category_features.name: Issue Management
category_features.definition: Identify and respond to unexpected problems or failures (ie. "negative events")

category_features.name: Live Chat
category_features.definition: Ability to chat online in real time

category_features.name: Project Management
category_features.definition: Plan and coordinate all the resources, costs and time needed to execute assignments

category_features.name: Scheduling
category_features.definition: Plan availability and assign specific time slots for tasks and resources

category_features.name: Behavioral Analytics
category_features.definition: Track and analyse user behavior within a system or network

category_features.name: Audit Management
category_features.definition: Plan, schedule and execute organization's accounts and assets to ensure they all comply with policies, laws, and requirements.

category_features.name: Compliance Tracking
category_features.definition: Track business operations to ensure they are performed correctly and according to industry regulations

category_features.name: Configuration Management
category_features.definition: Identify and maintain components (i.e. servers, configuration information, software, etc.) and their relationships across all service

category_features.name: Contract/License Management
category_features.definition: Track, store, and maintain contracts/licenses that come with procured products or services to ensure they are adhered to

category_features.name: Cost Tracking
category_features.definition: Record and monitor cost related information of assets (i.e. budget for assets, equipment costs, revenues, etc.)

category_features.name: Inventory Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage the quantity of resources on hand to maintain proper supply

category_features.name: Maintenance Management
category_features.definition: Assess and plan maintenance operations and updates to ensure longevity of physical assets

category_features.name: Procurement Management
category_features.definition: Organize and manage all processes/procedures involved in purchasing goods and/or services

category_features.name: Requisition Management
category_features.definition: Review, approve and cancel requests for goods/services to be purchased

category_features.name: Supplier Management
category_features.definition: Manage various aspects of the relationship with suppliers (e.g. interactions, history)

category_features.name: Access Controls/Permissions
category_features.definition: Define levels of authorization for access to specific files/folders

category_features.name: Alerts/Notifications
category_features.definition: Alerts/notifications within the system

category_features.name: Capacity Management
category_features.definition: Monitor/analyze service demand and performance to plan for adequate resources to meet current/future business requirements

category_features.name: Compliance Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage non-adherence to policies in a service, product, process, or supplier behavior

category_features.definition: An assembly of graphs and charts for tracking statistics and metrics

category_features.definition: Track and manage the quantity of resources on hand to maintain proper supply

category_features.name: Issue Auditing

category_features.definition: Track and organize the number of licenses available to the organization

category_features.name: Maintenance Scheduling
category_features.definition: Schedule predetermined or ad hoc maintenance services and labor requests

category_features.definition: Access a computer or data from a distant location

related_products.short_desc: MSP mode in Freshservice helps you provide enhanced IT support for multiple clients from a single platform.
related_products.features: Freshservice is an intelligent, right-sized ITSM solution that delivers exceptional employee experiences with an intuitive, scalable, no-code solution. With its state-of-the-art AI and ML capabilities, Freshservice helps organizations ease an IT agents workload and improve their productivity by automating mundane tasks. In addition to its AI capabilities, Freshservice is flexible and scalable enough to be used by both: companies relying on legacy systems and modern enterprises.

related_products.short_desc: Jira Service Management is an ITSM software that unlocks high-velocity teams to deliver great service experiences fast and together.
related_products.features: Jira Service Management is an ITSM solution that unlocks high-velocity IT, dev, operations, and business teams. Empowered teams can deliver great service experiences, without the complexity of traditional ITSM, and coordinate efforts for even more impact through Jira's open collaborative platform. Streamlined workflows, automation rules, queues, SLAs, and a self-service portal all empower IT, dev, operations, and business teams to deliver exceptional service management at scale with no silos.

related_products.short_desc: MSP friendly DNS Based Web content filter that blocks malware, ransomware and phishing attempts while providing web content control
related_products.features:
MSP Web Filtering and Security Solution. Advanced, real time Malware blocking.
DNS Based Web content filter and web security layer that blocks malware, ransomware and phishing attempts as well as providing web content control. We filter over 1/2 a billion DNS requests every day, identify 100,000 malware iterations a day and have over 1,500 MSP's. Cloud and gateway versions available. Improve your cybersecurity now.
Try a free Trial of WebTitan today, support included.

related_products.short_desc: Atera is the ultimate all-in-one MSP Software built for MSPs and IT Professionals. Includes everything you need. Try for Free Today!
related_products.features: Atera offers an all-in-one MSP Software built for MSPs and IT Professionals. Atera includes everything you need in one integrated solution: remote monitoring and management (RMM), PSA, remote access, patch management, billing, reports, network discovery and so much more! Atera's disruptive pricing model allows users to pay a fixed and transparent monthly cost that includes unlimited devices and endpoints. Try Atera today for free. No contracts or credit card needed.

related_products.short_desc: 2 out to 3 top MSPs choose ConnectWise for greater accountability, operational efficiency & profitability. See why. View the demo!
related_products.features: ConnectWise is the leading business operating system for IT service providers & consultants, MSPs, integrators & developers. Over 28 years, ConnectWise has become a standard in the IT industry with over 300 API integration partners. As a result, 2 out to 3 top MSPs choose ConnectWise for greater accountability, operational efficiency & profitability. View the demo and learn how you can join them.

related_products.short_desc: MSPs like you get more cost savings, business growth, and customer satisfaction with Kaseya's powerful RMM software. Get a demo today.
related_products.features: With Kaseya VSA, you get more from your RMM. MSPs like you that are torn between cost-savings, growth, and customer satisfaction in today's economic climate are moving forward with confidence knowing their most essential RMM functions are optimized while reaping the benefits of Kaseya's industry leading MSP-enablement offerings. Ready to power your MSP services? Get a demo today.

related_products.short_desc: JumpCloud's Directory-as-a-Service securely manages and connects your users to their systems, applications, files, and networks.
related_products.features: JumpCloud's cloud directory enables managed service providers (MSPs), internal IT departments, VARs/distributors, and DevOps teams to securely and easily enable access to any IT resource, from anywhere. With JumpCloud, you can centrally manage identities, access, and devices whether your clients work on macOS, Windows, or Linux systems. Plus, visualize and manage your clients from a single Multi-Tenant Portal - no more logging in and out of software instances.

related_products.short_desc: Pulseway is a simple, yet powerful RMM platform used by over 6,000 MSPs worldwide. An MSP Software designed to transform your business.
related_products.features: Used by over 6,000 MSPs world-wide, Pulseway a simple, yet powerful RMM platform with advanced automation, out-of-the-box patching engine, network discovery and reporting. Pulseway All-in-One MSP software delivers instant productivity, increased customer satisfaction, and additional revenue opportunities.

related_products.short_desc: Manage & monitor all your customers? Hyper-V & VMware backups from a single cloud console, on a monthly subscription. 30-Day free trial
related_products.features: Altaro VM Backup for MSPs is a monthly subscription program, built specifically for MSPs. It allows you to provide your customers with reliable virtual backups, recovery and replication. Pay per VM per month, with flexibility to set your own pricing model for your customers. You will get full access to all features across all customers, including Replication, CDP, Instant Boot, Deduplication, as well as the ability to manage all backups from one central console. Try it for free for 30 days.

related_products.short_desc: NinjaRMM is NinjaOne's powerful easy-to-use RMM, offering all the features, flexibility, and power MSPs need.
related_products.features: NinjaRMM is NinjaOne's powerful easy-to-use RMM, offering all the features, flexibility, and power MSPs need in a fast-to-setup, easier-to-use package. Our centralized, policy-based management approach puts automation at the center of your endpoint management strategy while Ninja's modern UI drives radical improvements to technician efficiency. With no implementation fees, simple per-agent pricing, and the best-rated support, NinjaRMM is built for the way MSPs work.

similar_products.short_desc: Atera is the ultimate all-in-one MSP Software built for MSPs and IT Professionals. Includes everything you need. Try for Free Today!

similar_products.short_desc: N-able N-sight RMM is a complete solution that makes remote access, management, ticketing, and billing easier for MSPs and IT Pros
similar_products.features: N-able N-sight RMM (formerly N-able RMM) is a complete remote monitoring and management platform designed to make managing, maintaining, and protecting IT assets easy for IT service providers, MSPs, and in-house IT professionals. From a single web-based dashboard, you get fast access and support tools, robust remote monitoring and management with patch management and drag & drop automation included, and ticketing & billing. N-able N-sight RMM is built for those who need to do more and earn more

similar_products.short_desc: Powered by automated detection and 24/7 human threat hunting, Huntress tracks down threats that evade other solutions.
similar_products.features: Huntress uses automated detection and 24/7 human threat hunting to track down threats that bypass most antivirus solutions, including persistent footholds which are often used by attackers to gain backdoor access into a network - undetected. Other services and features include Ransomware Canary file alerts, Managed Antivirus for Microsoft Defender, Host Isolation to stop the spread of critical attacks, External Recon for attack surface reduction, and Partner Enablement resources and support.

similar_products.short_desc: NinjaRMM is NinjaOne's powerful easy-to-use RMM, offering all the features, flexibility, and power MSPs need.
similar_products.features: NinjaRMM is NinjaOne's powerful easy-to-use RMM, offering all the features, flexibility, and power MSPs need in a fast-to-setup, easier-to-use package. Our centralized, policy-based management approach puts automation at the center of your endpoint management strategy while Ninja's modern UI drives radical improvements to technician efficiency. With no implementation fees, simple per-agent pricing, and the best-rated support, NinjaRMM is built for the way MSPs work.

similar_products.short_desc: HaloPSA brings everything an MSP needs into one centralised location.
similar_products.features: HaloPSA is a single, all-inclusive solution, designed for MSPs and service providers. HaloPSA gives you the power to manage your entire company with powerful out-of-the-box functionality. The platform offers features such as time-tracking and billing, advanced reporting, asset management, remote access, seamless integrations, automation, project management and CRM. Tailored to your requirements with an intuitive UI, you can remedy your client issues with an unlimited PSA solution

similar_products.short_desc: Automate is the only RMM platform in the industry developed by an MSP for MSPs to automate IT service delivery & drive revenue growth.
similar_products.features: ConnectWise Automate, formerly LabTech, is a leading global provider of remote monitoring, management (RMM), and automation software for today's IT service providers. Whether you're an experienced IT managed service provider (MSP) or an hourly rate one-man shop, Automate can help you significantly improve your operational productivity and efficiency by leveraging the power of IT automation. Take your free tour today!

similar_products.short_desc: 2 out to 3 top MSPs choose ConnectWise for greater accountability, operational efficiency & profitability. See why. View the demo!
similar_products.features: ConnectWise is the leading business operating system for IT service providers & consultants, MSPs, integrators & developers. Over 28 years, ConnectWise has become a standard in the IT industry with over 300 API integration partners. As a result, 2 out to 3 top MSPs choose ConnectWise for greater accountability, operational efficiency & profitability. View the demo and learn how you can join them.

similar_products.short_desc: Automate Your Business. Simplfy Your Life. Tigerpaw is a complete end-to-end business automation solution.
similar_products.features: Our unique, all-in-one solution combines the best features of a PSA tools solution, a robust CRM solution and a BPM software solution into a platform that provides complete visibility, coordination and control of all aspects of your business. With Tigerpaw One, every employee -- from the CEO to the field technician, and from the head of sales and marketing to the customer service representative -- will have the tools and resources he or she needs to be more productive.

similar_products.short_desc: Syncro is the integrated business platform for running a profitable MSP. Enjoy PSA, RMM and remote access in one affordable package.
similar_products.features:
Syncro is the integrated business platform for running a profitable MSP. Enjoy PSA, RMM and remote access in one affordable package.

PLUS! Integrations to 50+ MSP and business tools you also love and use amp your efficiency even more.

Syncro pricing is refreshingly simple-one flat fee for all RMM, PSA, and remote access features. Unlimited endpoints, no contracts, no minimums. 

Onboarding with Syncro is fast and free. Our bulk agent installer can have you up and running on all

similar_products.short_desc: ConnectWise RMM is a new solution built upon the ConnectWise Platform that combines: out-of-the-box automation with robust automation.
similar_products.features: ConnectWise RMM is a new remote monitoring and management solution built from the ground up to reinvent how MSPs adopt, interact with, and manage their RMM solution. ConnectWise RMM is built upon the infinitely scalable ConnectWise Platform that combines the best of the both worlds: out-of-the-box automation coupled with the robust automation needed to deliver customized services to your customers.

similar_products.short_desc: Enables Managed Service Providers & IT Consultants to offer backup & recovery services for M365 mailboxes, Teams, OneDrive, SharePoint.
similar_products.features: This monthly subscription program enables Managed Service Providers, IT resellers and IT consultants to provide backup and recovery services for Microsoft/Office 365 mailboxes, Teams, files stored within OneDrive and SharePoint, and Windows-based endpoints. MSPs can easily take backups and manage them through a convenient, multi-tenant, cloud-based console. M365 backups are automatically saved to our secure datacenters. MSPs simply pay per user, per month. Includes 24/7 support.

similar_products.short_desc: The N-able N-central? remote monitoring and management platform is designed to make managing complex IT networks simple.
similar_products.features: The N-able N-central? remote monitoring and management platform is designed to help managed services providers handle complex networks with ease. With extensive automation and in-depth configurability options, security features like antivirus, endpoint detection and response, patch management, and integrated backup, N-central is built to help MSP businesses efficiently manage intricate networks from one easy-to-use platform.

similar_products.short_desc: Managing your clients' networks is easy, automated, and more profitable with Auvik's network monitoring & management software.
similar_products.features: Auvik makes network management more profitable for MSPs. Monitor and manage an unlimited number of sites from one parent account, get an at-a-glance NOC view from a global dashboard, and integrate with popular PSAs and RMMs to automate and streamline the way you manage client networks. It's compatible with over 15,000 devices from more than 700 vendors, and comes with 50+ pre-configured and customizable alerts.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top IT Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of IT Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: IT Management software provides the tools and process for controlling and monitoring computer networks, including: operating systems, applications, network devices, security measures, mainframes, access control systems, web services, and databases. Organizations use IT Management applications to manage activities across their systems, evaluating capacity, user activities, software inventory and installation, server availability, and virus or malware protection. IT Management software is related to Application Performance Management software, Business Continuity software, Database Management software, Server Management software, Network Monitoring software and Network Security software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top IT Service software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of IT Service tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: IT Service software helps IT service providers to sell, implement, deliver and bill their services by automating field services and technician management. IT Service solutions are often ITIL compatible, flexible and customizable and are designed to allow organizations to focus on delivering service while at the same time reducing their overhead. For related software solutions see Service Dispatch software and Field Service Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top ITSM software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of ITSM tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: ITSM software, also known as Information Technology Service Management software, focuses on management of internal and external IT support. These applications guide IT organizations through the planning, design, development, delivery, and support of their services. ITSM solutions encompass such areas as Help Desk and IT Service.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Remote Monitoring and Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Remote Monitoring and Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Remote Monitoring and Management or RMM software is widely used by managed services providers to perform monitoring, maintenance and troubleshooting for their clients' IT systems.
